m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Cost Of Solar Systems From SolarCity vs Sunrun & Vivint Solar, + Cost Per Watt Of Solar Sales/Acquisition July 19th, 2016 by Zachary Shahan   We’ve written a lot about average solar power prices, especially in the US — utility-scale solar power prices and rooftop solar power prices. But we’ve seldom found or teased out prices from different rooftop solar installers. I think the last time I did so was when I highlighted that SolarCity’s prices (per watt) were about 34% higher than average rooftop solar prices in California , according to a Pick My Solar analysis
